summary: Completed frontend testing of Booking Settings page UI changes. Verified that 'Available Days' checkboxes and 'Default Session Duration' field have been successfully removed. All days (Sunday-Saturday) are now expandable with 'Add Slot' buttons available regardless of whether they have existing time slots configured.
passed_tests: Booking Settings page - 'Available Days' checkboxes REMOVED (0 checkboxes found on page)
Booking Settings page - 'Default Session Duration' field REMOVED (not found on page)
Booking Settings page - 'Time Slots by Session Type' section present
All 7 session type tabs visible (Maternity, Newborn, Studio Portraits, Family, Baby Birthday, Adult Birthday, Brand/Product)
Sunday (no slots) - expandable with Add Slot button (data-testid='add-slot-maternity-0')
Monday (no slots) - expandable with Add Slot button (data-testid='add-slot-maternity-1')
Tuesday (has slots) - expandable with Add Slot button (data-testid='add-slot-maternity-2')
Newborn tab - Sunday expandable with Add Slot button (data-testid='add-slot-newborn-0')
Family tab - Wednesday expandable with Add Slot button (data-testid='add-slot-family-3')
Days with existing slots show 'Copy to days...' and 'Copy to session...' options
Page description updated to 'Configure availability per session type and day'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Booking Settings page UI has been updated to remove 'Available Days' checkboxes and 'Default Session Duration' field. The new logic determines day availability based on whether time slots are configured for that day. All days are now expandable with Add Slot buttons available. The page uses data-testid attributes for all interactive elements (e.g., 'tab-{sessionType}', 'add-slot-{sessionType}-{dayId}', 'input-time-{sessionType}-{dayId}').

changes_verified: All days expandable regardless of slot configuration
Add Slot button available for all days
Day styling based on hasSlots (primary color if slots exist, gray if no slots)
Time slot schedule per session type per day working correctly

screenshots: .screenshots/sunday_expanded.jpg - Sunday expanded (no slots) with Add Slot button
.screenshots/monday_expanded.jpg - Monday expanded (no slots) with Add Slot button
.screenshots/tuesday_expanded.jpg - Tuesday expanded (has slots) with Add Slot and Copy options
